document_data.name: Ilyndele
document_data.mainbody: '''Ilyndele''' was a powerful member of [[Arcane (race)|the Arcane]] and one of three persons responsible for creating the [[World Serpent Inn]], according to the [[wizard]] [[Elminster]].
document_data.Relationships: Very little is known about Ilyndele except that the [[wildspace]] merchant was friends with an [[archmage]] from [[Toril]] named [[Alaurum]]. The two, together with the [[illithid]] High One [[Sharth]], are said to have "crafted" the inter-planar inn.
document_data.History: Hundreds of years before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Alaurum, Ilyndele, and Sharth built the inn itself. The [[demiplane]] within which the inn resided—and the plane's many portals—had already existed, supposed by some cosmologists to be a [[dreamscape]] resulting from a sleeping fragment of the [[World Serpent]].
